owner.name: Transit by Time
owner.description: Transition from one value to another according to a certain interpolator within a certain time range. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.

property.value: Transition from one value to another according to a certain interpolator within a certain time range. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.
